variable.name: Family_ID
variable.description: Indicates whether participant has a sibling in same cohort

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Randomly-generated 6-digit ID code preceded by CHOP ID code (95)
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: 16=Marshfield Clinic; 27=Vanderbilt University; 38=Group Health Cooperative; 49=Mayo Clinic; 52=Northwestern University; 63=Geisinger; 74=Mt. Sinai; 95=CHOP 6-digit random integer appended to the 2-digit site identifier.

variable.name: MOTHER
variable.description: Indicates whether participant has a mother in same cohort
variable.comment: No parents present in the cohort (all values = 0)

variable.name: FATHER
variable.description: Indicates whether participant has a father in same cohort
variable.comment: No parents present in the cohort (all values = 0)

variable.name: TWIN_ID
variable.description: Indicates whether participant has a twin in same cohort
